title: Lula da Silva ribadisce la sovranit√† del Brasile in risposta agli Stati Uniti
cleaned_sentences: The Brazilian president underlines the independence of the country during a press conference after travel to China and Russia "For a long time many have thought that Brazil was the courtyard of the United States home, but Brazil is not a courtyard, it is a free and sovereign country, with sovereign interests of its people".

So the Brazilian president Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva commented, during a press conference on the sidelines of the trip to China and Russia, the will expressed by Washington that he wanted to resume control of the destinies of Latin America.
"Brazil does not want to be better than anyone else, but does not accept being worse than anyone else," he added.
"We want to treat the United States with great respect and be treated with a lot of respect.
We are a very large country, with 213 million inhabitants who love their country.
For this reason, Brazil will not be anyone's courtyard.
Brazil will be the courtyard of Brazil's home, a free and sovereign country," he concluded.
